thread.title: Single Night Stay in NYC
thread.title_full: Single Night Stay in NYC - Review of Avalon Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: rpb52
title: Single Night Stay in NYC
text: In the city for a Clapton concert at MSG and selected 2 rooms at the Avalon Hotel for ourselves and our friends. Great spot, perfect location, plenty of restaurants and Bars nearby....staff was great, beginning with the Valet at the front door who took care of our car. Rooms were very clean, nicely decorated, all the charm of a great NYC hotel in mid town Manhattan. We were very pleased with the price, the stay and the unreal Caffeine /coffee dispenser downstairs in the common area. Would definitely return to the Avalon Hotel!
